title._content: Hauling Sunday Bible School Children In Calling Lake Alberta

tag.raw: John Leonard Sunday School Jeep Mennonite Board of Missions Mennonite Mission Network Athabasca Alberta Voluntary Service
tag.author: 52529054@N06

description._content:
Caption: 1961. Calling Lake, Alberta. John Leonard, Lewistown, Pennsylvania, picking up a load of children for S. B. S. out on the Calling Lake Indian Reserve. Because of road conditions this was the only way of transportation.

Citation: Mennonite Board of Missions. Photographs. Athabasca, Alberta Voluntary Service. 1962-1966. IV-10-7.2 Box 1 Folder 7 Photo I. Mennonite Church USA Archives - Goshen. Goshen, Indiana.
